--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> 
> OOC: Wheeljack-X should be recognizeable to Maxima whenever she 
wakes 
> up - he looks much like the original Wheeljack, only with a second 
> shoulder turret and a rocketpack.  He's also got an obvious Autobot 
> insignia on his chestplate.
> 
> Gotcha!
> 
> IC: 
> 
> 
> > Ragnar: What is that? A tiger-girl? A mutant?
> > 
> > "A transformer, actually." Wheeljack points out.  He switches his 
> > transmitter for a med-scanner.  "She seems to be okay, just 
knocked 
> > out when the ship hit."  Looking around, he recalls Ragner's 
earlier 
> > question.  "I'd say this rig could fly again, with some work.  
Maybe 
> > this chick could tell us what happened ..."
> > 
> > He kneels to examine the pilot more closely, looking for any 
injuries.
> > 
> 
> Her icy clear blue optics glowed, but remained still. She was not 
alone. 
> 
> > Ragnar looked at her quizzically.
> > 
> > Ragnar: But how can she be a transformer? She looks so different 
from
> > you, and even from Tyrael and his soldiers. My scanner barely 
show her
> > on magres, but they show her as red hot on infrared. Why is that?
> > 
> 
> "Because, I am a Decepticon," her deep growl feline femme voice 
stated, as 
> sher slipped her hand under & quickly got up to face her 'guests'. 
> 
> Her optics glanced to the 2. Then noticed Wheeljack & his insignia, 
as her 
> optic grew larger with a stunned recognition. "Autobot Wheeljack!" 
she 
> hissed.  
> 
> This was NOT how she wished for it all to go. Again, she cursed 
Alpha Trion 
> for reviving her like this.

"Close, but no cigar," Jackie waggles a finger.  "I'm Wheeljack-X, a 
clone.  The original's been dead for quite some time.  So why the 
meteor impression, honey?  What was so worth getting away from on 
Cybertron that you jumped into our lap?"

Some people have said that Wheeljack-X isn't playing with a full 
deck - and they're right.
